snippet: Analyzing the championship games or series of the N.F.L., N.B.A., N.H.L and Major League Baseball, and the major finals in golf and tennis, and identifying the statistics that determine champions.
abstract: Analyzing the championship games or series of the N.F.L., N.B.A., N.H.L and Major League Baseball, and the major finals in golf and tennis, and identifying the statistics that determine champions.

byline.original: By CARLTON J. CHIN and JAY P. GRANAT

headline.main: Keeping Score: Key Statistics Favor Heat
